item.name: VWCADFAG_ATENDIMENTO
item.desc: View de Pesquisa de Fluxo de Atendimento
item.query:
SELECT 1 AS TIPREL, FLACOD AS CODANI, MONTH(FLAFIN) AS NUMMES, YEAR(FLAFIN) AS NUMANO, A.ORGBAS, A.CODEMP, B.CODCMF , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD , SUM(NUMTES) AS VLRTPO FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 GROUP BY MONTH(FLAFIN), YEAR(FLAFIN), FLACOD, A.ORGBAS, A.CODEMP, CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END, B.CODCMF
UNION
SELECT 2 AS TIPREL, FLACOD AS CODANI, MONTH(FLAOUT) AS NUMMES, YEAR(FLAOUT) AS NUMANO, A.ORGBAS, A.CODEMP, B.CODCMF , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD , SUM(NUMTAD) AS VLRTPO FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLADCI IS NOT NULL AND FLAOUT IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 GROUP BY MONTH(FLAOUT), YEAR(FLAOUT), FLACOD, A.ORGBAS, A.CODEMP, CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END, B.CODCMF

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTO
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTOIBI
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento - Ibirapuera
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 AND CODEMP=2

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTOJDS
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento - Jardins
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 AND CODEMP=5

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTOMRB
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento - Morumbi
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 AND CODEMP=4 GO

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTOPCD
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento - Pacaembu
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 AND CODEMP=1 GO

item.name: VWFLUXOATENDIMENTOTTP
item.desc: View de Fluxo de Atendimento - Tatuapé
item.query: SELECT B.CODANI, FLAINI, FLAFIN, FLAOUT, A.CODEMP AS EMPKEY , CASE WHEN FLAPC1 LIKE '%internação%' THEN 'INTERNACAO' ELSE 'OUTROS' END AS TIPATD, NUMTES, NUMTAD FROM TBCADFAG A INNER JOIN TBCADANI B ON (B.ANIKEY = A.ANIKEY) WHERE STAREC = 1 AND FLACOD > 0 AND (FLAINI IS NOT NULL AND FLAFIN IS NOT NULL ) AND FLAATD = 1 AND CODEMP=3 GO

insertcommand.pre: IF(@FLAINI IS NULL AND @FLAFIN IS NULL AND @FLADCI IS NULL AND @FLAOUT IS NULL) SET @STAREC=0;

item.desc: Remove um período de processamento
Atualiza as referencias do Fluxo de Atendimento com as bases relacionadas

item.name: TBREGAGE
item.descriptor: Tabela de Registro de Controle de Agendas

item.name: VWAGENDA
item.desc: View de Pesquisa de Agendas
item.query: SELECT DSCSTR, CODVER, DSCSMY, DSCBAS, DATAGE, CONVERT(DATE, DATAGE) AS [DATA], CONVERT(TIME, DATAGE) AS HORA, B.SGLEMP, C.DSCSPT, D.DSCSTA FROM TBREGAGE A INNER JOIN TBCADEMP B ON (B.EMPKEY = A.CODEMP) INNER JOIN TBAGESPT C ON (C.CODSPT = A.CODSPT) INNER JOIN TBAGESTA D ON (D.CODSTA = A.CODSTA);

item.desc: Deleta uma versão de registros do controle de registros de agendas
Deleta uma versão de registros de uma empresa informada do controle de registros de agenda
Obtêm o registro com base na descrição da especialidade
item.query: SELECT CODSPT, DSCSPT FROM TBAGESPT A

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base na descrição do status
item.query: SELECT CODSTA, DSCSTA FROM TBAGESTA A

item.name: TBAGESPT
item.descriptor: Tabela de Registro de Agendas Especialidades

insertcommand.pre: IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBAGESPT (NOLOCK) WHERE CODSPT=0)) INSERT INTO TBAGESPT(CODSPT,DSCSPT) VALUES (0,'N/D');

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base na descrição da especialidade
item.query: SELECT CODSPT, DSCSPT FROM TBAGESPT (NOLOCK) A

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base no código da especialidade
item.query: SELECT CODSPT, DSCSPT FROM TBAGESPT (NOLOCK) A

item.name: TBAGESTA
item.descriptor: Tabela de Registro de Agendas Status

insertcommand.pre: IF(NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM TBAGESTA (NOLOCK) WHERE CODSTA=0)) INSERT INTO TBAGESTA(CODSTA,DSCSTA) VALUES (0,'N/D');

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base na descrição do status
item.query: SELECT CODSTA, DSCSTA FROM TBAGESTA (NOLOCK) A

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base no código do status
item.query: SELECT CODSTA, DSCSTA FROM TBAGESTA (NOLOCK) A

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base na descrição da empresa
item.query: SELECT * FROM TBCADEMP (NOLOCK) A

item.desc: Obtêm o registro com base no código do empresa
item.query: SELECT * FROM TBCADEMP (NOLOCK) A
